TopicTitle: No vehicles will load or save in VAB, but SPH still has them all

Articles.Content: My most pressing issue is that none of my saved rockets can be accessed in the 'load' function in the VAB, nor can I currently save anything new, but all are still available in the SPH. This seemed to happen randomly tonight. Any ideas?

My most pressing issue is that none of my saved rockets can be accessed in the 'load' function in the VAB, nor can I currently save anything new, but all are still available in the SPH. This seemed to happen randomly tonight. Any ideas?

Same problem here, but I fixed it.

The bug has something to do with the save files of certain craft. In my case, the bug triggered while using AGX, but many users report the same bug without mods. It has something to do with doing lots of reverting and saving, or possibly saving a craft in the VAB after using the widgets to place parts in a buggy position. In any case, the VAB craft file is corrupted. Delete the VAB craft file and everything returns to normal. In my case I opened windows explorer and went to the following file:

KSP\saves\SavedDameName\Ships

I then deleted the last 3 craft I had worked on when the bug occurred. I restarted KSP, and could then load craft into the VAB as normal. This means you lose any progress you made on a few craft, but at least means you don't have to delete the entire save.

I then deleted the last 3 craft I had worked on when the bug occurred. I restarted KSP, and could then load craft into the VAB as normal. This means you lose any progress you made on a few craft, but at least means you don't have to delete the entire save.

Few knows that you don't have to restart KSP in order to add\remove craft files. You don't even have to exit the VAB, you just have to close load craft menu. Simply alt-tab out of the game, add your craft file, go back and open load menu - your craft will be there.
